title: Want more Fortnite content? Turn on 2FA for a free emote
description: ![fortnite]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Now that you’ve got an authenticator app installed on your phone, why notsecure your other most important accounts such as Google, Facebook, Twitterand Amazon? Go on, it only takes a second.**Which two-factor authentication app do you prefer? Let us know@TrustedReviews.**
